text: Ra yahudiharuko nimti hamile nanga bha'eka sampurna janavaraharula'i varjita bana'eka thiyaum, ra ga'i ra bakhrako boso harama garidi'eka thiyaum, tara tyasa baheka juna (boso) tiniharuko pithyuma tamsi'eko huncha va andrama lageko huncha va hadamai tasi'eko huncha. Yo sajaya hamile tiniharula'i tiniharuko badamasiko karana di'eka thiyaum, hami ta samco bhannevala haum
